ProductInfo.Features:
•Nikon D3100 14.2-Megapixel DSLR Camera•NIKKOR 18-55mm lens, NIKKOR 55-200mm lens•Lithium-ion battery (EN-EL14), charger•Neck strap, hot shoe cover, body cap, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM•Owner's manual
